tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EarningsReports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    stock_movement VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE earnings_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT,
  price_date DATE,
  stock_price FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE predictions (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  stock_id INT,
  predicted_movement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_scores (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sentiment_category TEXT,
  score_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_price_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    date DATE,
    opening_price FLOAT,
    closing_price FLOAT,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    prediction TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES earnings_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    movement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_price_id UUID,
    movement_direction TEXT,
    change_percentage FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (stock_price_id) REFERENCES stock_prices(stock_price_id)
);
